input.sentences: the family went on a trip today .
they took a picture in front of the statute .
they took a picture that looked like they were under the statute .
they took a picture of the state .
finally they stopped and rested with the dog .
output.sentences: We decided to take a trip with the family.
There was a statue nearby and mom wanted a picture of us in front of it.
The statute looked great so mom wanted another picture and told us to looked down.
Then mom wanted just a picture of the statue.
We stopped and we rested for a good thirty minutes till finally we were able to go back to the hotel.
